taskDescription: Coniine, C8H17N, is the toxic principle of the poison hemlock drunk by Socrates. When subjected to Hofmann elimination, coniine yields 5-(N,N-dimethylamino)-1-octene. If coniine is a secondary amine, what is its structure?
